title: The Pursuit of Happyness
characterDescription: Chris Gardner, portrayed by Will Smith, faces homelessness and financial hardship while striving for a better life for his son.

title: 127 Hours
characterDescription: Aron Ralston, played by James Franco, gets trapped in a canyon and must amputate his arm to survive.

title: Apollo 13
characterDescription: Jim Lovell, played by Tom Hanks, leads his crew back to Earth after an oxygen tank explosion on their spacecraft.

title: Cast Away
characterDescription: Chuck Noland, portrayed by Tom Hanks, survives on a deserted island and learns to adapt to his circumstances.

title: The Revenant
characterDescription: Hugh Glass, played by Leonardo DiCaprio, perseveres through harsh wilderness and a bear attack to seek revenge.

title: The Martian
characterDescription: Mark Watney, portrayed by Matt Damon, uses his resourcefulness to survive on Mars after being left behind by his crew.

title: Life of Pi
characterDescription: Pi Patel, played by Suraj Sharma, survives a shipwreck and must coexist with a Bengal tiger on a lifeboat.

title: Unbroken
characterDescription: Louis Zamperini, portrayed by Jack O'Connell, endures extreme adversity as a prisoner of war during WWII.

title: Soul Surfer
characterDescription: Bethany Hamilton, played by AnnaSophia Robb, continues her surfing career after losing her arm in a shark attack.
